text: usakee qaum ke log daudate hue usake paas aa pahunche. ve pahale se hee dushkarm kiya karate the. usane kaha, "ai meree qaum ke logo! ye meree (qaum kee) betiyaan (vidhivat vivaah ke lie) maujood hai. ye tumhaare lie adhik pavitr hai. atah allaah ka dar rakho aur mere atithiyon ke vishay mein mujhe apamaanit na karo. kya tumamen ek bhee achchhee samajh ka aadamee nahin
